searchDocs.title: PlayData​
searchDocs.content: </> interface PlayData { priority: number weight: number stop_fade_time: number start_fade_time: number alpha: number looped: boolean } A config to describe an Animation Track

searchDocs.title: new​
searchDocs.content: </> AnimationManager.new( rig: Crunchyroll.Rig,-- A rig that has been made and defined using Crunchyroll character: Model -- The model where animations get applied to ) → AnimationManager-- returns the new AnimationManager Creates a new animation manager to play and stop animations

searchDocs.title: LoadAnimation​
searchDocs.content: </> AnimationManager:LoadAnimation( self: AnimationManager,-- The AnimationManager object options: PlayData,-- Crunchyroll's animation options to load animation: KeyframeSequence -- A animation id or the actual animation to load ) → AnimationPlayer-- Returns a new AnimationPlayer Loads a new animation onto the rig (Isn't played by default)

searchDocs.title: GetPlayingTracks​
searchDocs.content: </> AnimationManager:GetPlayingTracks( self: AnimationManager-- The AnimationManager object ) → PlayingTracks-- An array of the current animation players Returns the current playing tracks on the character

searchDocs.title: Update​
searchDocs.content: </> AnimationManager:Update( self: AnimationManager,-- The AnimationPlayer object dt: number-- Delta Time used to calculate time passed for animation updating ) → () Updates each animation player that is marked to be updated

searchDocs.title: Start​
searchDocs.content: </> AnimationManager:Start( self: AnimationManager-- The AnimationPlayer object ) → () Starts the animation manager

searchDocs.title: Start​
searchDocs.content: </> AnimationManager:Start( self: AnimationManager-- The AnimationManager object ) → () Stops the animation manager

searchDocs.title: new​
searchDocs.content: </> NpcClass.new( npc: Model ,-- NPC model rig: crunchyroll.Rig,-- Rig definition used for animation playback walkspeed: number-- Movement speed in studs per second ) → NpcClass Creates a new NPC controller instance. The NPC model must have a PrimaryPart set. Signals are initialized but not connected automatically.

searchDocs.title: SetState​
searchDocs.content: </> NpcClass.SetState( self: NpcClass,-- The NpcClass object newState: "Idle" | "Walking"-- New NPC state ) → () Sets the NPC's current state. This updates the internal state and fires StateChanged.

searchDocs.title: SetWalkSpeed​
searchDocs.content: </> NpcClass.SetWalkSpeed( self: NpcClass,-- The NpcClass object walkspeed: number-- New speed in studs per second ) → () Sets the NPC's walking speed.

searchDocs.title: GetTracksPlaying​
searchDocs.content: </> NpcClass.GetTracksPlaying( self: NpcClass-- The NpcClass object ) → {AnimationTrack } Returns all currently playing animation tracks.

searchDocs.title: LoadAnimation​
searchDocs.content: </> NpcClass.LoadAnimation( self: NpcClass,-- The NpcClass object options: AnimationManager.PlayData,-- Playback options animation: KeyframeSequence -- Animation keyframes ) → AnimationPlayer Loads an animation into the NPC's animation manager. Animations must be provided as a KeyframeSequence.

searchDocs.title: MoveTo​
searchDocs.content: </> NpcClass.MoveTo( self: NpcClass,-- The NpcClass object pos: Vector3 ,-- Target world position priority: number?-- Optional priority (higher executes first) ) → () Queues a movement request to a world position. Positions are processed in priority order. If the NPC is idle, movement begins immediately.

searchDocs.title: Destroy​
searchDocs.content: </> NpcClass.Destroy( self: NpcClass-- The NpcClass object ) → () Stops animations & cleans Npc object

searchDocs.title: Play​
searchDocs.content: </> AnimationPlayer:Play( self: AnimationPlayer-- The AnimationPlayer object ) → () Marks an animation for update

searchDocs.title: Play​
searchDocs.content: </> AnimationPlayer:Play( self: AnimationPlayer-- The AnimationPlayer object ) → () Unmarks an animation for update

searchDocs.title: Step​
searchDocs.content: </> AnimationPlayer:Step( self: AnimationPlayer,-- The AnimationPlayer object dt: number-- Used to calculate next limb(s) position ) → () Updates an animation

searchDocs.title: UpdateCFrames​
searchDocs.content: </> AnimationPlayer:UpdateCFrames( self: AnimationPlayer,-- The AnimationPlayer object rootCF: CFrame -- The root's CFrame of the npc ) → () Updates character limb's CFrames with new ones solved by crunchyroll
